solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public int searchInsert(int[] A, int target) {--newline--            int low = 0, high = A.length-1;--newline--            while(low<=high){--newline--                int mid = (low+high)/2;--newline--                if(A[mid] == target) return mid;--newline--                else if(A[mid] > target) high = mid-1;--newline--                else low = mid+1;--newline--            }--newline--            return low;--newline--        }--newline--}
